inn1.comm: gets forward to defend the full-length delivery to the on side
two slips in place and Vijay gets forward to defend a full delivery. He was caught hanging in the back foot  to a full delivery in the first game
around the off stump, shaping away, gets forward to steer it to point
Uppish flick! It was full and on the leg and middle line, Vijay wristed it aerially to the right of square-leg umpire
leans forward to defend to the cover region
gets forward to guide this delivery down to third man for a single
lands on a good length around off and veers further away; left alone
And again. Vijay has a close look at it.
Good carry and bounce on this occasion. Vijay had shouldered arms and de Villiers took it in front of his head.
angling away from Vijay who lets AB take this below chest-high
lands on a good length just outside off and moves away again. Smith applauds from first slip
Crash! Vijay leaned across, picked the length delivery outside off and hit it on the up and over cover
just outside the off stump, defended to the off
lands outside off and moves further away; there was width on offer but Tendulkar decides to let it go.
Lovely delivery this. It was fuller, lured Tendulkar forward for the push-drive before seaming away past the outside edge.
shorter in length and well outside off ,left alone. Tendulkar then jogs down the track and has a close look at the pitch. He then goes back to his stance; he is standing outside the crease
covers his off stump and lets this ball curve away to the keeper
lands on a good length outside off and goes away, left alone
around the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler. Vijay has a word with the umpire. Sight screen troubles?
lands outside off and goes away, left alone
this one lands in line of the stumps and angles away, Vijay leans forward to defend to the off
gets forward and across to defend the slower cutter to cover
fuller but again lands well outside off and slants away; left alone again
full in length, just outside off, pushed towards mid-off for a single. Parnell fires a direct hit at the striker's end - Tendulkar was home - and the stump went flying down the leg side.
gets behind the line to push the short-of-length delivery to mid-on
slower, just outside the off, Vijay waits on the front foot before pushing it to the off side
Here comes the bouncer. Vijay drops his wrists and sways away. Steyn stares, Vijay practices a forward defensive push.
the teaser, fuller and outside off,  after the bouncer. Vijay lets AB take it
this one is on the middle and leg, back of length, Vijay gets back to clip it through midwicket for couple of runs
nice slower one, cuts in to the middle , Vijay is a touch late in adjusting to the pace and the inward movement but does so eventually as he pushes it to the off side of the pitch

Run out of Tendulkar missed It was turned straight to short-fine leg fielder and he sets off for the single. The ball went straight to Amla and Tendulkar turns back but gives up the ghost as Amla releases the ball. The ball bounces over the stumps. Tendulkar throws his head back and slips his tongue out!
in the zone outside off, left alone
again slants away from Tendulkar who shoulders arms
short in length, around off but that length allows Tendulkar to stay back and work it wide of Amla at short fine-leg for a single
banged in short outside off with a scrambled seam and Vijay goes for the pull but the ball is well outside off and bounces over the flashing blade.
gets forward to tap it close on the off, wants a single and is sent back very quickly. Over-gaaji is a fashionable thing in Chennai gully cricket.
Fab on drive. It was full and straight, Tendulkar leaned forward to whip it from the middle-stump line to right of mid-on.
And so, Steyn pushes this outside off, left alone
lands full in length outside off and moves away, Tendulkar shoulders arms
lands outside off stump, left alone
shorter in length, slower, comes in from outside off, Tendulkar guides it to backward point
the bouncer outside off, loopy tennis-ball bounce there, and Tendulkar, who was thinking about the pull shot, lets the ball go through to AB
full in length, angling away from Vijay who steers it to backward point
edges over slips It was a good--length delivery outside off and Vijay tried to slog it over wide mid-on and it flew to third man boundary
leans forward to defend to the off side
angling away from Vijay who tries to drive on the up but gets no wood on leather. AB takes it. Oohs and aahs from the close-in fielders
on the middle and off line, defended on the front foot

Tsotsobe breaks through. Vijay goes for the big heave-ho across the line over mid-on but doesn't quite connect as well as he would have hoped. The ball lobbed over mid-on and Morne rushed back to take a good catch, with the ball dropping over his shoulder
lands around the leg stump line, full in length, moves towards middle and leg, worked to the on side
straightens on the middle stump line, Virat had pressed his front leg across but manages to get the bat around in time to work the ball to fine-leg
fullish, and outside off stump, Virat didn't get forward, just bent his knees and went for the cover drive and edged it in the air but between backward point and gully
slips down the leg for the first wide of the day
full in length, around the off and middle line, Tendulkar leaned forward to defend and the ball ran away off the inner half of the bat to square-leg
bounces outside off from short of length, Virat pushes it down to point
Full and on the middle and leg but Virat had again pressed that front pad too far across;; He gets the bat around the pad and dabs the ball uppishly but to the vacant spaces in midwicket
slower, cuts away from Tendulkar who shuffles across and holds his bat inside the line. He takes fresh guard now.
shorter in length outside off, cut to point
full in length, slanted across Tendulkar who drives to right of that short square point where Botha makes a fine diving stop
straightens just outside off stump, full, Tendulkar stayed back but adjusted to the inward movement at the last moment and pushed it out to the off
slower cutter, just outside off, Tendulkar runs it to right of first slip where Smith makes a half-stop. They think about stealing a single but Kohli sends Tendulkar back in time
leans forward to defend this one back to the bowler
full and just outside off, defended to cover
full in length around the off stump line and Virat Kohli leaned forward to caress it to the right of mid-off. Neatly done.
overpitched outside off stump and Virat gets forward, bends his knee to drive to sweeper cover
Crunchy! Fullish on the middle and Tendulkar whips it away through wide midwicket.
And he corrects his length; on a good length around the off stump line, Tendulkar opens the bat-face to guide it to third man
fuller, on driven straight to mid-on
slower one, full and outside off, Tendulkar stretches forward to drive to left of mid-off
Width outside off and Kohli went after it with an attempted square-cut but the ball bounces over the blade
gets behind the line to defend a short-of-length delivery to the off side
fuller but well outside off, left alone
Another attempted cut. Again, the ball flies over the bat.
just outside the off stump, steered to backward point
slower one outside off, TEndulkar stumbles on to the front foot and tries to guide the ball to third man but makes no contact
short in length, on the middle, worked wide of midwicket for a single
overpitches this time on the middle and leg, flicked to deep square-leg region.
leans forward to drive the full-length delivery but its intercepted at short extra cover
slower one, full outside off, Tendulkar goes for the square drive but squeezes it down to third man
Shot! Full in length outside off and Virat Kohli leans forward and across to punch it firmly to right of sweeper cover.
short of length, bounces around the off, steered to backward point
full in length, just outside off, pushed back to Morne who leaps to his right to stop the ball and fires the throw back!
short in length just outside off, steered to third man for a single
stays back to go for the pull and ends up dragging it down to fine-leg for a single
in the zone outside off stump, left alone and it bounces once before it reached AB
lunges across to defend to point
pushes this to mid-off for a quick single. Botha fires the throw but misses the stumps. Tendulkar might just have got in even if it was a direct hit. May be .. may be not ..
angles away from the batsman who offers no shot
short of length this over, turned to short fine-leg fielder
bends his knee, gets his weight back, opens the bat-face and guides this to third man
fullish, flicked to deep square-leg region for couple of runs
full again and Virat plays a whippy on drive well to the  right of Steyn at mid-on.
short in length just outside off, steered to backward point
wants a single after he pushed to left of Miller at cover. Virat says now. Tendulkar stops mid pitch. Miller only makes a half-stop though and the batsmen get across in time
leans across to tap this good-length delivery to third man
short in length, bottom-edges the chop to point for a single
stays back to push this to mid-on
leans forward to defend to short cover
leans forward to work it through midwicket
leans forward to wrist this from outside off to wide of mid-on
works this to Duminy at midwicket
taps this to backward square-leg for a single
works this off break to Smith at short fine-leg region
And again. He wrists it straight to Smith
leans forward to push this to the off side for a single
full in length, Virat caresses it down the track past the lunging Morne and will get couple of runs
gets forward and across to defend the good-length delivery to short cover
straightens outside off from the good length, Virat is beaten, chasing it ..

Virat is run out  Out by miles. He pushed towards cover point and sets off for the run. He is sent back, and tries to dive back inside the crease but is not even in the frame. Miller swoops in to fire a direct hit. Clatter!
from round the stumps to Yuvraj who is in trouble, hanging on the back foot. It was a full delivery but he was caught at the crease and stabbed it off the outer edge to third man
rocks back to cut to Amla at deep point
punches it to left of cover where Duminy makes a fine diving stop
tossed it fuller, driven to long-on
leans forward to cover drive but the ball comes on slowly off the track and he edges it down the track

Botha dashes off in a celebratory run to nowhere! It turned in from outside off stump, Tendulkar went back and it perhaps kept a touch low and came off slower than he thought it would. Tendulkar tries to punch it to the off side but edges it to his off stump. He had just edged the previous delivery which too had come off a touch slow ...
lunges forward in his inimitable fashion to defend
stays back to push it to the off side
full in length, just outside off, Yuvraj defends it back to Morne
short in length, on the hips, tucked behind square-leg
full in length and in the corridor outside off, left alone
shuffles back to steer this to backward point
leans forward to push-drive to the leg side
around the off stump line, steered to point, wants a run but is sent back in time
more confusion over the single! This time Dhoni sets off after Yuvraj dabs towards midwicket
quicker one, from round the stumps, straight with the angle, punched to long-on
stays back to defend a quickish full delivery
slower, full again, worked to square-leg for a single
More confusion! Run out around the corner. This was pushed to mid-off, Dhoni sets off before retreating. Yuvraj manages to get back in time
full in length, around off, pushed to extra cover
in the corridor outside off, left alone
full in length, around off, pushed to mid-off for a quick, but well-run, single
in the zone around the off stump, punched out to mid-off
in the corridor outside off and Yuvraj is beaten .. tentative poke

Catch it  was the cry. It was tossed on the off and middle, Dhoni tried to work it to the on side but shut his bat-face too early. The leading edge and the ball popped up on the off side. Miller rushed forward from cover and dived full length.. Supah effort. He nearly got there too!
dabs this to the on side for a single
leans forward to flick it to the on side
from round the stumps, outside off, driven to deep cover
stays back to push it to left of extra cover for a single
quick and full, almost at the blockhole, jabbed back down the track
shortish delivery outside off stump, Dhoni flat-bats it through the left of mid-off. Thump!
overpitches this time, Dhoni mistimes the on drive to mid-on
leans forward to defend the full-length delivery to cover
from round the stumps, too short and width too ,, forced away to sweeper cover
full in length outside off, driven to Amla at sweeper cover
from round the stumps, fullish, driven to mid-off
leans forward to on drive to long-on
is late in getting forward but does so eventually, to punch this to sweeper cover
goes well back to dab this off break from round the stumps to midwicket
lands on the leg stump line, straightens a touch to hit the pad. Huge shout from Botha... AB was down the leg side and didn't appeal Hawk Eye suggests it would have clipped the leg stump
goes back to dab this to midwicket
leans across to push this to cover point
low full toss on the pads, flicked for a single
on the middle, worked past square-leg for a single
gets down the track to stab it to the off
floated well outside off, driven to long-off
from round the stumps, worked past square-leg for a single
just down the leg side, Yuvraj goes for the paddle sweeps and the ball races away to the fine-leg boundary
rocks back to cut it to Amla at deep cover
again drifts down the leg and Yuvraj tries to lap it around the corner and the ball rolls away towards fine-leg region
on the middle stump line, dabbed to the on side
on the pads, turned to midwicket. Miller fires the throw right at a surprised Yuvraj, who was inside the crease, and put his left hand out to stop it .. Seems to be in pain. He checks his wrist.
gets forward to dab this to the on side
plays the sweep shot to retain the strike
pitched up on the off stump, driven down towards long-off
shortish on middle and leg from round the wicket, paddles it down wide of short fine for a couple of runs
short ball outside off, slapped hard towards deep cover for a single
goodish length on the off stump, gets forward and defends it to cover
pitched up on middle and leg, swept hard to deep square leg
wide down the leg side, quick and flat, Dhoni tries to knock it on its head, can't connect
straightish delivery on middle, turned to midwicket
fires it on middle and off from round the wicket, defended on the pitch
good length on the off, driven hard through the line to long-off
shortish outside off, there is a bit of turn, rocks back and cuts it to deep point for a single
saw him step out of the track, landed on a good length, Yuvraj adjusted well and pushed it into the off side
varying his pace here, straightish on middle and a bit of turn, Yuvraj closes the face and gets a leading edge back towards the bowler
fuller, driven hard towards long-on for a single
good length and Yuvraj chases that one, didn't move, just went through with the shot, missed
short on middle and he pulls that away, didn't get it off the meat, managed to get it past deep midwicket for a couple of runs, excellent effort in the deep to dive and haul it back
bouncer, banged in short but down the leg side, called a wide
slower one this time, appeared to pick it, tried to dab it into the off side, got an inside edge past leg stump, stole a quick single
short of a good length on the off, pushed away towards point
short of a good length again, gets on the back foot to punch it but straight to extra cover
goodish length on the off and it's defended respectfully to extra cover, good tight over from Steyn
stays back to punch it back to the bowler
quicker, on the leg and middle though, nudged past square-leg
low dipping full toss, eased down to long-on
lands outside off on a good length. Yuvraj goes for the forcing shot and ends up slicing it towards long-off
on the pads, flicked to Amla at deep midwicket
floated full outside off, Dhoni shuffles across to wrist it to short fine-leg fielder
full in length, angling away from Yuvraj who goes for the off drive and edges it through the vacant slip region
on the pads this time and Yuvraj flicks it to deep square-leg region where Colin makes a neat diving stop, moving to his left from deep midwicket
short in length outside off, steered to left of backward point where Duminy makes yet another neat save. Good fielding by the hosts so far
the bouncer arrives and Yuvraj ducks
full in length, on the middle and off line, slower in pace, Yuvraj ends up edging his dab to his pad
in the zoen outside off, shortish, Yuvraj goes for the cut but doesn't connect
full, on the middle, Dhoni pings long-on
from round the stumps to Yuvraj, low full toss, punched to left of Tsotsobe at long-on
on the off and middle, from a good length, defended on the front foot
on the middle and leg, tucked to square-leg for a single
turns in from outside off,  cut to Amla at deep point
floated full around off, driven to left of Steyn at long-off for couple of runs
from round the stumps, goes with the arm outside off, Dhoni reaches out to cut to deep point
moves down the track and drives to Parnell at long-off
from round the stumps, around off, pushed to short extra cover
slower, Dhoni lunges out to drive to Morne at long-off
on the middle, on a good length, punched to the on side for a single
stays back to punch it to long-off for yet another single
lunges forward to wrist it wide of midwicket for a single
full, around off, sliced to short extra cover
slower this time, on a good length, Yuvraj drives it over Botha.. Steyn moves quickly to his left at long-off to keep it to a single
pushes this to cover point for a single
moves well own the track to work it to the on side, but misses and is hit on the pad. Shout for lbw from Botha
works this past midwicket for a single
from round the stumps, short in length outside off, carved down to third man
stays back to cut it to sweeper cover
Crunchy! It was short and wide and Yuvraj crashes it over backward point
fuller this time and Yuvraj lofts it over mid-off for couple of runs. On 49 now and looking to get on with things
from over the wicket now, short in length and angling away, Yuvraj chops it of the bottom edge to wide lone slip
moves forward to work this through midwicket
steers this to Duminy at backward point

brings up his fifty with a nice leg glance. It was full in length and on the pads and he tucked it away to fine-leg. The two batsmen get in the middle for a chat, Yuvraj laughs as he turns back to return to his crease
Tsotsobe roars! It landed on a good length outside off and Yuvraj tries to knife it on the up and through the line but hits it straight to mid-off
bouncer first up and Raina hops to fend it away to the off side
More cheers as Tsotsobe stops a defensive push and threatens to throw back
slashes this to Steyn at third man.
shortish on the stumps, swatted to square-leg
banged in short on the leg stump line, Raina shuffles inside the line to help it down to fine-leg region.
stays back to turn this full delivery to midwicket
kicks up towards the rib cage, Dhoni shuffles across to try to dab it to the on side and the ball crashes into the waist and rolls away
almost caught by Morne. It kicked up from short of length, Raina pushed it tamely back and Morne lunged and dived but the ball died on him
gets forward to defend to short midwicket
works this to the on side for a single
full in length ,defended to the off side
stays back to steer this well to the right of backward point for a single
full in length, angling away from Dhoni who drives to short extra cover
stays back to work this one through midwicket
shuffles across to turn the short-of-length delivery past square-leg for a single
full in length, on the middle, turned behind square-leg and he comes back for the second run
banged in short outside off, Raina mistimes the pull .. the ball rolls towards mid-on .... They think about the run, and turn back but Dhoni slips. He recovers in time to get back to safety
tries the short one, a slower bouncer,  but it sits up nicely for Raina, who was waiting on the back foot, and pulls this neatly over midwicket.
stays back and is late in getting forward to play the cover drive and edges the full delivery past the leg stump
full in length, edges the drive to the on side of the pitch
stays back to guide this past point for a single
full in length, around the off stump line, pushed quietly to covers

almost a run out. Dhoni pushed it to the on side and took the first step. Raina responded by charging across but was sent back. He turned back and dived back inside the crease. There was no direct hit from the midwicket fielder but Raina would have got home
stays back to clip this to deep backward square-leg region
full in length, just outside off, punched to Amla at deep cover
banged in short and Raina pulls and will collect a single down to deep midwicket

Absolutely plumb! Raina seemed to be expecting a short ball and was well inside the crease. It was a fuller one, though. He had a waft at it and missed. Trapped! Tsotsobe strikes in the first ball of the batting Powerplay.
a lovely sharp well-directed bouncer at Rohit who was shaping to fend at it before he just about managed to sway away from the line
slower one this time, guided to backward point
full again, slashed away firmly but Duminy makes yet another diving stop at backward point. He has had quite an evening here.
gets forward to dab this one to point
That's a wicket maiden in the batting Powerplay! Super stuff from Lonwabo Tsotsobe. Rohit drove the final delivery, a slower one, to mid-off
full in length, on middle and leg, wristed to Colin standing to the left of square-leg umpire
shorter in length, straightening around off, defended to cover
shout for lbw as Steyn fires in a yorker. It was going down the leg side. The ball hits the boot and rolls to the off. Was there an inside edge there? Not so sure.. anyway ...
short in length on the pads. Rohit top-edges the lap shot and the ball goes behind square-leg
low full toss, driven down the track and Steyn stretches his right foot across to kick it away! Risky stuff.
short in length, pushed to mid-off for a single. Another tight over
Castled! What a night Tsotsobe is having. It was a very full delivery outside off, Dhoni tried to whip it away but the ball took the inside edge and crashed into the furniture. 4-19 for Tsotsobe!
full delivery around off, squeezed out to the off
around the off, angling away, guided to third man
full delivery, slower one, eased to long-off
low full toss on the middle, whipped to deep midwicket
slower one on the leg side, tapped to square-leg
stays back to punch this to cover
stays back to defend to the off side of the pitch
backs away to jab it to the on side
slower off cutter outside off, steered to backward point
Harbhajan clears the front foot and goes for a big heave-ho but only succeeds in top edging it to midwicket where Miller takes it
gets forward to ease this to long-on
leans forward to flick it to the on side
backs away and its a full delivery outside off and he stabs it to the off
moves outside leg stump and Steyn fires it full and outside off.. AB collects
Good catch from Lopsy! What a night for him ! Zaheer had top-edged a slog towards third man.. Tsotsobe rushed diagonally across to his left and slide to get under the skier.
low full toss on the middle stump and Rohit whips it through midwicket to collect a boundary. Rare event tonight.
really full delivery outside off, Rohit crouches to slice it to backward point
full delivery on the leg and middle, pushed to mid-on
some width on offer outside off, Nehra guides it to third man

The ball, a full-length delivery, was around the off stump line and Rohit thrust his front pad across and tried to work it across the line. He missed. Taufel raises his finger. India crumbling here in Jo'burg.
full delivery just outside off, Munaf tries to run it down to third man and it rushes past the diving AB
pokes at the this full delivery and the ball rolls away to the off side
backs away to steer the full delivery to third man.
overpitched around off,  driven away to sweeper cover
That's that. India all over 190. Nehra leaned forward to scoop a full delivery to left of mid-off where Botha moved diagonally across and lunged forward to pouch it

inn2.comm: lands on a good length around off and Amla pushes it back to the bowler
Lovely shot Hashim! It was slightly short of length and straightening on the middle and leg, Hashim presses back to whip it stylishly through midwicket
outside off this time, Amla mistimes the drive to cover. He then practices leaving it
full in length outside off, pushed out to cover
keeps a touch low after landing on a good length outside off, Amla edges the drive to the off
full in length outside off, steered to point
in the corridor outside off stump, Smith leans across to defend the good-length delivery and is beaten, pushing inside the line
reaches outside off and punches the short-of-length delivery through to the left of mid-off
punches the back-of-length delivery to the off
lands on a good length just outside off, punched out to cover
Lovely delivery from Munaf. It landed on a good length outside off and seamed in a touch. Amla went for the on-the-up drive but the ball clipped the inner edge.
another good-length delivery in the off-stump corridor, left alone
stays back to work this to the substitute fielder Piyush at midwicket
lands on a good length and tilts away from the off stump, guided to point
fuller and Smith pushes it to right of mid-on for a single
good probing delivery straightening from a good length outside off, Colin was shaping to play at it before he let it go through to the keeper
on the off stump line, steered to backward point
full in length, just outside off, pushed down to mid-off
lands on a good length around off and moves away, left alone
lands on a good length on the middle and leg and moves across towards middle and off, Smith holds his balance to defend it to the on side
shorter in length, around off, pushed to the off
tries the fuller delivery but Smith is on to in a flash: he leans forward to drive it to the left of mid-off
Whack! He drew back the length but pushed it wider outside off and Smith crashed it through point
gets the line and length right this time- on a good length and moving towards off, Smith defends
gets forward and across to defend to cover
cuts in from outside off, dabbed to short midwicket
shuffles across to clip a short-of-length delivery to deep square-leg region
full in length, homing in on the off stump, defended out to the off
full in length, on the middle, eased to right of Vijay at mid-on
Crack! Banged in short of length and Smith moved quickly, to swivel and pull it through midwicket
full delivery on the middle, Colin drives it crisply back down the track and Munaf takes some pace off it and the ball rolls to mid-on
works this past square-leg for another couple of runs
leans forward and across to mistime the drive to cover
full in length, around off, driven to mid-off
short in length, lands middle and leg and moves towards middle, Colin gets back to defend it back down the track
short in length, straightens on the middle and leg line, tapped to the on side
starts off with a full delivery around off, hint of away swing, driven to the off
Crunchy! It was a short-of-length delivery just outside off and Colin punched it sweetly on the up and to the right of Zaheer at mid-off
Thump! A short ball from Nehra and Smith crash-pulls it to the midwicket boundary
fuller in length, just outside off, pushed to point
gets back to clip the short-of-length delivery to deep square-leg
around the off stump line, pushed out to cover
stays back to steer the short of length stuff to the off
punches this down the track, the bat-face shuts as it happens now and then with Smith, Munaf stretches his left hand to make a half-stop
sprays to the pads and Smith plays the leg glance to collect another boundary.
fuller, on the middle, whipped to midwicket
short in length outside off, guided to third man
tries to work this to the on side but doesn't connect properly; the ball rolls out to the off side of the pitch
from round the stumps, just outside off, cut to point
comes down the track, harbhajan shortens the length and Smith defends to the on side
flighted on a good length around off ,eased to cover
quicker, shorter as well and Smith presses back to clip it through midwicket
rocks back to cut but its intercepted at point
leans forward to defend to the off
stays back to push this to Munaf at mid-off
Wallop! Stunning. It was the full delivery on the stumps and Colin Ingram, who grew up in a farming district around a cricket field, has lifted it up and over long-on
Nice come back. This one lands on a good length outside off and straightens, Colin is beaten, pushing inside the line
Dropped by Dhoni It wasn't a great  ball - It was short and wide,  Colin went for the cut and edged it .. Dhoni lunged to his left but doesn't get his gloves under the ball.
this is a much better delivery. It landed short of length around off and straightened. Colin was squared-up in defense and the ball ran off the edge past the lone slip
fuller, around the off, driven to the off
from round the stumps, nice delivery, turning away from the off stump line, Smith pushes at it and the ball runs of the edge, wide of the diving slip fielder
goes back to try work this leg-stump delivery to the on side but it rolls of the pad
turns away from the off stump, jabbed to backward point
even better delivery. It drifted in from round the stumps, landed on the middle and turned towards off and middle. Smith pushed inside the line and edged it to backward point
on the leg stump line, straightens, dabbed past square-leg
Colin goes for the sweep and bottom-edges it past the leg stump. Harbhajan holds his head
in the zone outside off, extra bounce, stabbed down to third man
in the region outside off, Smith tries to knife it on the up but is beaten
full in length, just outside off, Smith stays back to guide it to third man
full delivery outside off, Colin is late in getting forward and is beaten, trying to for the big off drive
shuffles to the off and works the ball around through midwicket for couple of runs
leans forward and across to play a lovely caressed off drive well to the right of Munaf at mid-off

Trapped! from round the stumps, it landed on a good length on the off stump line and moved towards off stump. Colin leaned forward to defend and it must have struck the pad first.Replays in. It hit the pad first before it hit the bat
gets back to turn this to midwicket
gets off the mark with a punch to the off
moves down the track and clips this through to deep midwicket
leans well forward to turn this to square-leg
leans forward to defend to the on side
full in length, around the off stump line, AB defends softly , perhaps too softly and the ball rolls back and moves past the leg stump
around the off stump line, defended to the off side
full in length outside off stump, driven to cover
drifts to the leg side, tries to flick it but misses and it brushes the pad and Dhoni dives to take it
lands on a good length and moves across towards off, punched out to the off side
edged over slips. de Villiers reached across to force a delivery through the off side and ends up slashing it over slip fielder
gets down on his knee to sweep but misses and is struck on the front leg. Shout for lbw but that was just outside off
leans forward to dab this to midwicket
gets back to turn it to short midwicket
flighted around the off stump line, eased to long-on
skips down the track and taps the flighted delivery to square-leg for a single
slip and backward short-leg in, on the off stump line, on driven to long-on
AB, who looked pretty scratchy out there, is gone now. It lands on a good length around the off stump line, and seams away, AB leans forward to defend and it clips the outer edge. Fine delivery this.
lands outside off and moves further away, left alone
this one moves in towards middle, worked to midwicket
in the zone outside off, left alone
full in length, on the off stump line, JPD leans forward to defend it to the on side
gets behind the line to punch to cover
gets back to clip it to the leg side but is struck high on the pad
gets forward to push this back down the track
slip, backward short-leg watch Smith go down the track to defend
presses back to punch this to long-on
Nice stuff from JPD. He advanced down the track, reached the pitch and whipped it to midwicket boundary
goes down the track again but Harbhajan shortens the length and Duminy is hit on the pad, lunging forward to defend.
punches this to cover for a single
walks down the track, Nehra bangs it in short and Duminy swats it to the on side for a single
full in length, on the off stump line,defended to the off
fuller, outside off, driven to mid-off
full and moving in with the angle, Smith works it to left of midwicket where Virat makes a diving half-stop
shortish delivery, pulled away to the fielder in the deep for a single
goes down the track to defend a delivery dipping on him
moves down the pitch again, Harbhajan shortens the length and Smith defends
short in length, quickish, outside off, cut to cover
drifts to the leg stump line, Smith was down the track, adjusted, tried to work it to the on side but stabs it down the track.. lovely delivery
gets back to clip the short-of-length delivery to deep midwicket
lands on the leg stump line, and spins,, Duminy defends it down the track
leans forward to drive to right of midwicket where virat makes a very fine diving stop and first threatens to throw at the non-striker's end before he has a shy at the striker's end
Whack. Nehra tries the short ball and Smith smashes it to the midwicket boundary
tries to crash this on the up through the off but can't beat the in field
stays back to defend to the off
just outside off stump, guided to backward point
will get his fifty with a little dab to the on side. The crowd roar their approval.
quicker one, on the off and middle, punched to long-off
goes down the track to push it back to HArbhajan
fuller, Duminy stays back and lunges across in the end to push it wide of cover
skips down the track to stab this one to the on side
on the off stump line, punched back to the bowler
rushes down the track and lifts it well to the right of deep midwicket for couple of runs
banged in short and Duminy pulls it away
Whackity whack! It was a short-of-length delivery outside off and Smith plays a nice crunchy on-the-up shot through cover point
leans forward to punch this back to Zaheer
full in length, tailing in, worked to deep midwicket
short in length outside off, punched to deep backward point
glides forward and across and punches a good-length delivery on the up to sweeper cover
presses back to force it to deep point region
quicker one, on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
on the pads, Smith tries to work it to the on side and it rolls off the thigh pad to fine-leg region

moves down the track, doesn't reach the pitch of the flighted delivery that dipped on him but Smith knew there was no mid-on and he lunged out to lift it over the infield.   Rohit gets across in time to make a diving stop
goes down the track and pushes this to the off side
gets back to work this past square-leg
moves down the track and on drives the full toss to long-on
gets well forward to defend it back to Suresh
pauses at release before floating it outside off, Smith goes after it but gets the thick edge that flies past the slip fielder
lands on the middle and leg, turns away, from round the stumps, Smith edges the defensive push and the ball rolls to slip
stretches forward to edge his off drive to backward point
stays back to punch it to long-off for a single
stays back to punch it to midwicket
gets back to punch through covers
rushes down the track and heaves the flighted delivery from outside off straight to long-on! Guess he wanted to finish things up in a hurry but ...
stays back to punch it through the off side for a single
floated outside leg and Miller sweeps to get off the mark
on the off stump line, pushed to Raina at extra cover
low dipping full toss, driven to midwicket where Harbhajan fumbles
gets back to punch this to cover
moves well down the track and decides to lunge out and defend. The ball bounds off the pad - the bat hits the pad - and Dhoni steps forward to take it and appeals for a catch
presses back to punch this to long-on

run out chance on the middle stump line, pushed towards cover ... they set off for the risky single after some hesitation. Miller scrambles across frantically, Dhoni crouches eagerly behind the stumps but the fielder (didn't see who it was)  fails to pick it up cleanly
leans forward to defend down the track
leans well forward to defend to the off
on the off stump line, Smith pushes outside the line and edges it to the pad
goes down the track but is beaten in flight and the ball bounds off the pad to left of slip where Vijay dives to 'catch' it.
around the off stump line, pushed out to cover
quicker, on the middle, Smith goes back to dab it forward of square-leg for a single
stretches forward to drive to short extra cover
leans well forward to defend
gets forward to ease this back to Suresh
quicker one, short of length, punched to long-off
short in length, pushed down to long-on for another single
fuller, around off stump line, Smith retains the strike with an off drive to long-off
stretches well forward to ping long-off
goes down the track but doesn't move fluently enough and doesn't get to the pitch of the ball. He lunges out in the end to stab this to the on side
Did I say in the previous ball that he didn't move down the track fluently? He rushes down the track smoothly this time and crashes this to the straight boundary. Thunderous wallop!
gets back, crouches to adjust to the low bounce and pushes it out to the off
goes back to cut to Nehra at backward point
leans forward to push this to cover point for a single
leans well forward to tap to midwicket
moves down the track, first towards the off and then back in line and whips it to backward square-leg region
gets a leading edge as he tries to work this to the on side .. but the ball turned away from the middle stump .. it lands safely clear of any fielder, though
leans forward to defend this
presents the full bat-face in defense
presses back to clip this past square-leg
from round the stumps, on the leg and middle line, defended back to the bowler
just outside off stump, forced away to cover
lands on a good length around off and spins past the outside edge. Harbhjan is bowling from round the stumps
toppie on the off stump line but short in length and Miller rocks back to crunch it to the cover boundary
extra bounce on this one as it kicks up from a length around off and middle, Miller stabs it to short leg
slip, short-leg and silly-point watch Miller defend on the front foot. Harbhajan's quota is over. He bowled very well today.
from a round-armish action, from round the stumps, on the leg and middle, worked through the on side
gets down the track and forces this to Harbhajan at deep midwicket
leans forward to flick the fuller delivery to Harbhajan at deep midwicket
quicker one, on the off stump line, squeezed to backward point
moves down the track but doesn't reach the pitch of the ball;  he stretches forward to defend
backs away to crash this one through extra cover. Neatly done. South Africa close in on this target

He has dragged it on. And he sinks to his knee and stays there for a while before he walks away. It was a length delivery that landed outside off and straightened. Smith tried to punch it through the off side but got the fatal inside edge. He was done in by that straightening
gets on the back foot to tap it to the off and they scamper across for the single
punches this to right of Piyush at mid-off for a single
leans forward and across to punch it through covers
stays at his crease to steer this to backward point
fuller, in the channel outside off and Botha is beaten, going for the drive. Munaf holds his head
takes couple of steps down the track and glances this to the left of the diving short fine-leg fielder
full and straight, defended back to Zaheer

Miller gone! SA six down.Now then... Now then .. It was the slower bouncer, and Miller couldn't adjust his pull to the pace of the ball. It actually cut in from outside off and bounced. The top edge takes the ball to square-leg. Zaheer spreads his arms and smiles in joy.
in the corridor outside off stump and he is beaten, pushing inside the line
short in length outside off, run down to third man
leans forward to defend to the off side.
leans forward to defend to the off
on the pads, rolls away for a leg bye
leans forward to defend this and the ball rolls behind the wicket on the off side
beaten outside off! Parnell goes for the cover drive and the ball whooshes past the edge
kicks in as it straightens on the middle and off, stabbed away to the off
gets forward and across to defend

And then they were three. The game is hurtling towards a thrilling finale. India have come back from nowhere. It landed on a good length, from round the stumps and just about straightened..  Botha gets forward to defend and gets the edge. No pad! And he walked away without any showing much drama..
from round the stumps, on the off stump line, defended to the off
full in length, outside off, squeezed of the outer edge to third man
stretches across to drive and edges it to his pad
works this to through midwicket
leans across to defend
leans across to punch it to sweeper cover
in the zone outside off and Steyn is beaten, trying to steer it to third man
leans forward to defend it back down the pitch
on a length around off, pushed to Raina at cover
straightens around the off stump, defended to the off
stays back to punch this and it runs of the outer edge through point and they will take three valuable runs.
from round the stumps, straightens around off, Steyn plays away from the body and stabs it to his pad
full in length outside off, leans forward to defend to cover

run out chance missed by Yuvraj. It was tapped towards backward point and they scamper across for the risky single. yuvraj moved in, collected and fired from close but missed! The batsman was well outside the crease. Kohli can't believe it and he sinks to the ground. Zaheer holds his head.

Shot! It was the short-of-length delivery outside off and Parnell plays a quality back-foot punch to backward point boundary .. Munaf rushes across and tries to stop it with his foot but can't and he gets across the ropes and collides with the security guard
punches this one straight to point
kicks up from short of length and Parnell does well to take the bottom-hand off the handle and defend
short in length, punched to long-on
on the middle and leg, pushed back to Yuvraj
on the middle and off, pushed to cover
around the off stump line, steered to point
flighted full on a length, driven back to the bowler
quicker one down the leg side. Dhoni appeals for a catch as the batsman misses the leg glance; think it clipped the pad.. wide signalled

Steyn is run out! It was pushed towards mid-on and they rushed across for another risky run. Pressure. Tension. The midwicket fielder  (vijay) rushed to his left to intercept it and the throw comes to Yuvraj who collected and moved his hands towards the stumps. The ball nearly popped out of his hands but he broke the stumps in time. Gone! Eight down and wobbling. What is happening out there?
the bouncer from over the wicket, swayed away
worked to the on side for a single
in the corridor, straightens from a good length, Wayne is beaten, stabbing inside the line
stays back to punch this to wide of Munaf at third man region. A single. 12 more. Lopsy is in the dressing room
rushes past the edge! It straightened outside off and Morne plays well inside the line. Zaheer smiles. The camera pans to a section of the crowd who look absolutely stunned.
fuller delivery, mistimes the drive back to Zaheer who stops it and stares at the batsman
from round the stumps, on the leg stump line, rolls of the pad
on the pads again, worked to midwicket
floated full, driven to long-off for a single
stays back to punch this to midwicket.
fuller, on the off and middle line, driven back to Raina

Top shot! The pressure-relieving shot. Will it be the game breaker? It was slightly short in length and outside off, Morne rocked back to cut it through backward point. The crowd are up on their feet.
on the off stump line, pushed to left of point. Both batsmen take a step forward, think about the single before deciding against it. Wise decision. A run out now won't look too good on the CV
drifts to the pad, rolls away to short fine-leg.. Dhoni hares after it.
short in length, just outside off, run down to third man
fuller, outside off, Parnell goes for the square drive and edges it down to third man
the bouncer on the leg stump line and Morne ducks. Morne checks with the umpire how many balls left in the over. One more.
cuts in from around off stump, stabbed to midwicket. No run.
full in length, on the off and middle, edges the drive to the on side. Just three more now.

Morne has blown it! Munaf nails him! It was a short delivery outside off and Morne went for the match-winning four. Cut. Crash. The ball flew but straight to point! The Indians roar. Enter Lonwabo Tsotsobe, who bowled so wonderfully earlier in the evening
goes for the lbw- full and straight, Lonwabo gets the bat in front of the pad to defend. the crowd roar!
short in length, outside off, Lopsy steers it to Zaheer at third man. More applause.
in the zone outside off, tapped to point

India have won! What a stunning collapse from South Africa. They are going to hear that Choke word all over again at the press conference. It was another shortish delivery outside off and he has cut it straight to Yuvraj at point!  Parnell can't believe what he has done. Munaf takes out the final two in this over. Parnell stands there, and bites his helmet strap. Meanwhile. Yuvraj is on a celebratory dash to nowhere. Munaf smiles. Indians mob him. Parnell stands still. 
In the absence of Jacques Kallis, South Africa are carrying a long tail and it has cost them today. The critics will bay for blood. They will scream that SA have choked again. India have bounced back yet again. It's 1-1. Phew.  When Smith fell, after taking the batting Powerplay, it was 152 for 5.  189 all out.
